{CompanyName} has invited you to join the Consent Platform!

Accept Invitation

Consent is a digital mobile wallet to store user credentials

Consent is leading the digital credential verification Industry by helping individuals verify their background quickly in a transparent manner. You as an Consent user own your Credential data and have an opportunity to receive tokens in return for sharing it via our Consent platform – depending on who you wish to share, when and how long.

We’re thrilled to welcome you on our Consent Platform!


Cheers,
Infoeaze Team
